00001 #ifndef NDARRAY_TABLES_Field_hpp_INCLUDED
00002 #define NDARRAY_TABLES_Field_hpp_INCLUDED
00003 
00004 #include "ndarray/tables_fwd.hpp"
00005 #include "ndarray/Vector.hpp"
00006 
00007 namespace ndarray { namespace tables {
00008 
00009 template <typename T, int N>
00010 struct Field {
00011     typedef T Element;
00012     typedef typename boost::mpl::int_<N>::type ND;
00013     typedef typename boost::mpl::bool_<(N==0)>::type IsScalar;
00014 
00015     std::string name;
00016     Vector<int,N> shape;
00017     int offset;
00018 
00019     template <typename T1, int N1>
00020     bool operator==(Field<T1,N1> const & other) const { return false; }
00021 
00022     template <typename T1, int N1>
00023     bool operator!=(Field<T1,N1> const & other) const { return true; }
00024 
00025     bool operator==(Field<T,N> const & other) const {
00026         return name == other.name && shape == other.shape 
00027             && (offset == other.offset || offset < 0 || other.offset < 0);
00028     }
00029 
00030     bool operator!=(Field<T,N> const & other) const {
00031         return !this->operator==(other);
00032     }
00033 
00034     Field() : name(), shape(), offset(-1) {}
00035 
00036     Field(Field const & other) : name(other.name), shape(other.shape), offset(other.offset) {}
00037 
00038     Field & operator=(Field const & other) {
00039         if (&other != this) {
00040             name = other.name;
00041             shape = other.shape;
00042             offset = other.offset;
00043         }
00044         return *this;
00045     }
00046 };
00047 
00048 }} // namespace ndarray::tables
00049 
00050 #endif // !NDARRAY_TABLES_Field_hpp_INCLUDED
